description: create bundle deal. Relevant restrictions refer to FAQ：https://open.shopee.com/faq/254

query.name: bundle_deal_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a bundle deal activity.

query.name: item_list
query.description: The items added in this bundle deal promotion.

query.name: item_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

query.name: status
query.description: The status of bundle deal item：enable = 1；disable =0

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking

schema.name: item_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

schema.name: fail_error
schema.description: Indicate error type if one element hit error.

schema.name: fail_message
schema.sample: This product does not set shipping channel.
schema.description: Indicate error details if one element hit error.

schema.name: success_list
schema.description: The list of succeed added items
